recurringEvents.title: Journal Club
descriptionParagraphs: Journal Club is a meeting where members pick a paper of their choice to present, which is followed by a question period where the audience can ask questions and discuss the results/methods. It should be submitted a few days in advance to spiecpjc@gmail.com or post it in our Discord under the #papers channel so that people can read it ahead of the Journal Club session!
Coffee, tea, and light snacks will be provided at the meetings. Please BYOM (bring your own mug) if possible!

recurringEvents.title: Plot Review
descriptionParagraphs: Plot Review is an event where members will showcase a figure that they recently created and present it, along with any relevant background to help members understand it. It may be a simple figure or complex one, but the idea is to both keep others updated to the research going on at Carleton, as well as have members practice explaining their thesis to a wider audience. At the end of each Plot Review presentation, members will fill out a scorecard, those with the highest overall points will win a small prize.
Coffee, tea, and light snacks will be provided at the meetings. Please BYOM (bring your own mug) if possible!
